pages.title: Configuration
pages.text: Can be disabled in the configuration file.

pages.title: All Targets
pages.text: Chocobos have a tendency to disarm Their targets$(br)-Chance on hit, to have the target drop their main-hand / off-hand items

pages.title: Spider Targets
pages.text: Chocobos can at times knock a string out of the spiders.

pages.title: Cave Spider Targets
pages.text: Chocobos are able to dislodge fermented spider eye, from Cave spiders.

pages.title: Skeleton Targets
pages.text: Chocobos can at times knock a bone off the skeleton.$(br)-What's one less bone for those boys?.

pages.title: Wither Skeleton Targets
pages.text: Chocobos can at times knock a bit of charcoal off of them on each hit.$(br)- It use to be a bone, but now it's fuel.

pages.title: Iron Golem Targets
pages.text: Chocobos can at times knock a spare poppy off of the golem.$(br)-somewhat risky for a weird reward
